data.description: An interface to connect to the MSN network
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wanted to be able to write a perl bot that was able to connect to
    MSN, Oscar and Yahoo. There were no good MSN modules, and none that
    supported protocol version 9 - So I have written this module which
    does support MSNP9, as well as logging on to msn via passport.
